edu.ucla.sspace.clustering.seeding
Interface KMeansSeed

All Known Implementing Classes:
GeneralizedOrssSeed, KMeansPlusPlusSeed, OrssSeed, RandomSeed
public interface KMeansSeed

An interface for KMeans seeding algorithms. Implementations must compose initial centroid seeds from a data set by either choosing an already existing data point or composing a linear combination of existing data points.

Implementations must be state free and threadsafe.

Author:
Keith Stevens

Method Summary
 DoubleVector[] chooseSeeds(int numCentroids, Matrix dataPoints)
          Returns an array of length numCentroids that contains centroids composed of either vectors from dataPoints or a linear combination of vectors from dataPoints.
 

Method Detail

chooseSeeds

DoubleVector[] chooseSeeds(int numCentroids,
                           Matrix dataPoints)
Returns an array of length numCentroids that contains centroids composed of either vectors from dataPoints or a linear combination of vectors from dataPoints.
